sourcesContent:
import { faSearch } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";
import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";
import { Button, Col, Row } from "@themesberg/react-bootstrap";
import InputDatePicker from "components/form/InputDatePicker";
import { Form, Formik } from "formik/dist/index";
import { useEffect } from "react";
import { useDispatch } from "react-redux";
import { callApi } from "reducers/apiSlice";
import Swal from "sweetalert2";
import InputField from "../../../../components/form/InputField";
import InputSelect from "../../../../components/form/InputSelect";
import InputSelectApi from "../../../../components/form/InputSelectApi";
import ErrorMessage from "../../../../components/text/ErrorMessage";
import ApplicationStatus from "../../../../constants/ApplicationStatus";
import EmployeeTypeStatus from "../../../../constants/EmployeeTypeStatus";
import UserRole from "../../../../constants/UserRole";
import { AuthUser } from "../../../../helpers/AuthUser";
import { UrlBuilder } from "../../../../helpers/UrlBuilder";
import { Approval } from "./Approval";

const ListFilter = ({ onSubmit, editMode = false }) => {
    let roles = AuthUser.getRoles();
    const dispatch = useDispatch();
    return (
        <Formik
            initialValues={Approval}
            onSubmit={(values, { resetForm }) => {
                onSubmit(values);
            }}
        >
            {({ values, errors, setFieldValue }) => {
                if (values.divisionCode == "00") {
                    values.districtCode = "00";
                    values.thanaCode = "00";
                    values.unionId = 1;
                }
                useEffect(() => {
                    setFieldValue("districtCode", "");
                    setFieldValue("thanaCode", "");
                }, [values && values.divisionCode]);

                return (
                    <Form>
                        <Row>
                            {roles.includes(UserRole.INSTITUTE_ADMIN) ||
                                roles.includes(UserRole.INSTITUTE_HEAD) ? (
                                <>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="আবেদনকারীর ধরন"
                                            name="employeeTypeStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "শিক্ষক",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.NON_TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "কর্মচারী",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="employeeTypeStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="আবেদনকারীর নাম"
                                            name="applicantName"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="আবেদনকারীর নাম"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="পদবি"
                                            name="designationId"
                                            operationId={UrlBuilder.mpoDsheApi(
                                                `employee/designation/list?instituteTypeId=${AuthUser.getUserInstituteTypeID()}`
                                            )}
                                            storeName="designation"
                                            value="id"
                                            text="designationNameBn"
                                            type="number"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="designationId" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="বিষয়"
                                            name="subjectId"
                                            operationId={UrlBuilder.mpoDsheApi(
                                                `employee/subject/all`
                                            )}
                                            storeName="subjectList"
                                            value="id"
                                            text="subjectNameBn"
                                            type="number"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="subjectId" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                            name="tid"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="শিক্ষক/কর্মচারী আইডি লিখুন"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="tid" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="অনুমোদনের স্ট্যাটাস"
                                            name="applicationStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.APPROVED,
                                                    name: "APPROVED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.CANCELED,
                                                    name: "CANCELED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.UNDER_REVIEW,
                                                    name: "UNDER REVIEW",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.REVIEW_PENDING,
                                                    name: "REVIEW PENDING",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="applicationStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                </>
                            ) : (
                                ""
                            )}
                            {roles.includes(UserRole.USEO) ? (
                                <>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="প্রতিষ্ঠানের ধরন"
                                            name="instituteTypeId"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: 11,
                                                    name: "স্কুল",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: 2,
                                                    name: "কলেজ",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: 12,
                                                    name: "স্কুল এন্ড কলেজ",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="instituteTypeId" />
                                    </Col>
                                    {/* <Col  xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="ইআইএন নম্বর"
                                            name="instituteId"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="ইআইএন নম্বর লিখুন"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="instituteId" />
                                    </Col> */}
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="কর্মচারীর ধরন"
                                            name="employeeTypeStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "শিক্ষক",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.NON_TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "কর্মচারী",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="employeeTypeStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                            name="tid"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="tid" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="অনুমোদনের স্ট্যাটাস"
                                            name="applicationStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.APPROVED,
                                                    name: "APPROVED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.CANCELED,
                                                    name: "CANCELED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.UNDER_REVIEW,
                                                    name: "UNDER REVIEW",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.REVIEW_PENDING,
                                                    name: "REVIEW PENDING",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="applicationStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                </>
                            ) : (
                                ""
                            )}

                            {roles.includes(UserRole.DEO) && (
                                <>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="উপজেলা/থানা"
                                            name="thanaCode"
                                            operationId={UrlBuilder.commonApi(
                                                `thana/all?districtCode=${AuthUser.getUserInstituteDistrictId()}`
                                            )}
                                            storeName="thana1"
                                            value="thanaCode"
                                            text="thanaNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="প্রতিষ্ঠানের ধরন"
                                            name="instituteTypeId"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: 11,
                                                    name: "স্কুল",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: 2,
                                                    name: "কলেজ",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: 12,
                                                    name: "স্কুল এন্ড কলেজ",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="instituteTypeId" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="আবেদনকারীর ধরন"
                                            name="employeeTypeStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "শিক্ষক",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.NON_TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "কর্মচারী",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="employeeTypeStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                            name="tid"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="tid" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="অনুমোদনের স্ট্যাটাস"
                                            name="applicationStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.APPROVED,
                                                    name: "APPROVED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.CANCELED,
                                                    name: "CANCELED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.UNDER_REVIEW,
                                                    name: "UNDER REVIEW",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.REVIEW_PENDING,
                                                    name: "REVIEW PENDING",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="applicationStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                </>
                            )}
                            {roles.includes(UserRole.DDCOLLEGE) ||
                                roles.includes(UserRole.DDSCHOOL) ? (
                                <>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="জোন"
                                            name="zone"
                                            operationId={UrlBuilder.mpoDsheApi(
                                                "zonal-office/all"
                                            )}
                                            storeName="zone"
                                            value="id"
                                            text="name"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="জেলা"
                                            name="districtCode"
                                            operationId={
                                                values.zone
                                                    ? UrlBuilder.mpoDsheApi(
                                                        `zonal-office/district-all?zonalId=${values.zone}`
                                                    )
                                                    : ""
                                            }
                                            storeName="district1"
                                            value="districtCode"
                                            text="districtNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="উপজেলা/থানা"
                                            name="thanaCode"
                                            operationId={
                                                values.districtCode
                                                    ? UrlBuilder.commonApi(
                                                        `thana/all?districtCode=${values.districtCode}`
                                                    )
                                                    : ""
                                            }
                                            storeName="thana1"
                                            value="thanaCode"
                                            text="thanaNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>

                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="আবেদনকারীর ধরন"
                                            name="employeeTypeStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "শিক্ষক",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.NON_TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "কর্মচারী",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="employeeTypeStatus" />
                                    </Col>

                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                            name="tid"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="tid" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="অনুমোদনের স্ট্যাটাস"
                                            name="applicationStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.APPROVED,
                                                    name: "APPROVED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.CANCELED,
                                                    name: "CANCELED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.UNDER_REVIEW,
                                                    name: "UNDER REVIEW",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.REVIEW_PENDING,
                                                    name: "REVIEW PENDING",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="applicationStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                </>
                            ) : (
                                ""
                            )}

                            {roles.includes(UserRole.DSHE_Programmer) ||
                                roles.includes(UserRole.DSHE_SA) ||
                                roles.includes(UserRole.DSHE_DG) ? (
                                <>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        {/* <InputSelectApi
                                            label="বিভাগ"
                                            name="divisionCode"
                                            operationId={UrlBuilder.commonApi(
                                                "division/all"
                                            )}
                                            storeName="division1"
                                            value="divisionCode"
                                            text="divisionNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        /> */}
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="জোন"
                                            name="zone"
                                            operationId={UrlBuilder.mpoDsheApi(
                                                "zonal-office/all"
                                            )}
                                            storeName="zone"
                                            value="id"
                                            text="name"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="জেলা"
                                            name="districtCode"
                                            operationId={
                                                values.zone
                                                    ? UrlBuilder.mpoDsheApi(
                                                        `zonal-office/district-all?zonalId=${values.zone}`
                                                    )
                                                    : ""
                                            }
                                            storeName="district1"
                                            value="districtCode"
                                            text="districtNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="উপজেলা/থানা"
                                            name="thanaCode"
                                            operationId={
                                                values.districtCode
                                                    ? UrlBuilder.commonApi(
                                                        `thana/all?districtCode=${values.districtCode}`
                                                    )
                                                    : ""
                                            }
                                            storeName="thana1"
                                            value="thanaCode"
                                            text="thanaNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="প্রতিষ্ঠানের ধরন"
                                            name="instituteTypeId"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: 11,
                                                    name: "স্কুল",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: 2,
                                                    name: "কলেজ",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: 12,
                                                    name: "স্কুল এন্ড কলেজ",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="instituteTypeId" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="আবেদনকারীর ধরন"
                                            name="employeeTypeStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "শিক্ষক",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.NON_TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "কর্মচারী",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="employeeTypeStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                            name="tid"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="tid" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী এনআইডি"
                                            name="tid"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী এনআইডি"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="tid" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="অনুমোদনের স্ট্যাটাস"
                                            name="applicationStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.APPROVED,
                                                    name: "APPROVED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.CANCELED,
                                                    name: "CANCELED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.UNDER_REVIEW,
                                                    name: "UNDER REVIEW",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.REVIEW_PENDING,
                                                    name: "REVIEW PENDING",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="applicationStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <div className="contentBox-modified m-0">
                                        <div class=" text-center p-10" style={{ background: " linear-gradient(90deg,#01579b,#3a6073)", borderRadius: " 5px", color: "#fff" }}><h5 class=" text-white m-0"><b >All Approve</b></h5></div>
                                        <div class="contentBoxBody mt-20"></div>
                                        <div className="row">
                                            <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                                <InputDatePicker
                                                    label="রিলিজ আবেদন তারিখ"
                                                    name="fromReviewDate"
                                                    setField={setFieldValue}
                                                    dataValue={values.fromReviewDate}
                                                />
                                            </Col>
                                            <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                                <InputDatePicker
                                                    label="সর্বশেষ রিলিজ আবেদনের তারিখ"
                                                    name="toReviewDate"
                                                    setField={setFieldValue}
                                                    dataValue={values.toReviewDate}
                                                />
                                            </Col>
                                            <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                                <InputSelect
                                                    label="রিভিউআর"
                                                    name="reviewedRole"
                                                    type="text"
                                                    value="id"
                                                    data={
                                                        [
                                                            {
                                                                id: "USEO",
                                                                name: "USEO",
                                                            },
                                                            {
                                                                id: "DEO",
                                                                name: "DEO",
                                                            },
                                                            {
                                                                id: "DD_ZONAL_SCHOOL",
                                                                name: "DD ZONAL SCHOOL",
                                                            },
                                                            {
                                                                id: "DD_ZONAL_COLLEGE",
                                                                name: "DD ZONAL COLLEGE",
                                                            },
                                                            {
                                                                id: "AD_ZONAL_COLLEGE",
                                                                name: "AD ZONAL COLLEGE",
                                                            },
                                                            {
                                                                id: "ZONAL_DIRECTOR",
                                                                name: "ZONAL DIRECTOR",
                                                            },
                                                            {
                                                                id: "PROGRAMMER_ZONAL_OFFICE",
                                                                name: "PROGRAMMER ZONAL OFFICE",
                                                            },
                                                            {
                                                                id: "DD_ZONAL_COLLEGE",
                                                                name: "DD ZONAL COLLEGE",
                                                            }

                                                        ]}
                                                    text="name"
                                                />
                                            </Col>
                                            <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                                <InputSelect
                                                    label="রিভিউআর  স্ট্যাটাস "
                                                    name="reviewStatus"
                                                    type="text"
                                                    value="id"
                                                    data={[
                                                        {
                                                            id: "REVIEW_FORWARD",
                                                            name: "REVIEW FORWARD",
                                                        },
                                                        {
                                                            id: "REVIEW_BACKWARD",
                                                            name: "REVIEW BACKWARD",
                                                        },
                                                        {
                                                            id: "CANCELLED",
                                                            name: "CANCELED",
                                                        },
                                                        {
                                                            id: "APPROVED",
                                                            name: "APPROVED",
                                                        },
                                                        {
                                                            id: "BACK_TO_APPLICANT",
                                                            name: "BACK TO APPLICANT",
                                                        },
                                                    ]}
                                                    text="name"
                                                />
                                            </Col>
                                        </div>
                                        <div className="row float-end">
                                            <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                                <Button
                                                    type="submit"
                                                    className="m-5"
                                                    variant="success"
                                                    onClick={() => {
                                                        //handleClose();

                                                        Swal.fire({
                                                            title: "Are you sure?",
                                                            text: "You want To Approve  Selected Application!",
                                                            icon: "warning",
                                                            showCancelButton: true,
                                                            confirmButtonColor: "#3085d6",
                                                            cancelButtonColor: "#d33",
                                                            confirmButtonText: roles.includes(
                                                                UserRole.DSHE_DG
                                                            )
                                                                ? "Yes, Approve it!"
                                                                : "Yes, Forward it!",
                                                        }).then((result) => {
                                                            if (!result.isDismissed) {
                                                                let data = {
                                                                    applicationType:
                                                                        "INDEX_RELEASE",
                                                                    reviewFromDate:
                                                                        values?.fromReviewDate,
                                                                    reviewStatus: roles.includes(
                                                                        UserRole.DSHE_DG
                                                                    )
                                                                        ? "APPROVED"
                                                                        : "REVIEW_FORWARD",
                                                                    reviewToDate:
                                                                        values?.toReviewDate,
                                                                    reviewedRoleId:
                                                                        values?.reviewedRole,
                                                                    searchStatus:
                                                                        values?.reviewStatus,
                                                                    approveReviewDtos: {
                                                                        toReviewerRoleId:
                                                                            AuthUser?.getRoleID(),
                                                                    },
                                                                };

                                                                dispatch(
                                                                    callApi({
                                                                        operationId:
                                                                            UrlBuilder.mpoDsheApi(
                                                                                roles.includes(
                                                                                    UserRole.DSHE_DG
                                                                                )
                                                                                    ? `approve-reviewer/index-delete-release-all-application-approve`
                                                                                    : `approve-reviewer/index-delete-release-application-view-all-review`
                                                                            ),
                                                                        output: "saveAllApplication",
                                                                        parameters: {
                                                                            method: "POST",
                                                                            body: JSON.stringify(
                                                                                data
                                                                            ),
                                                                            header: {
                                                                                "Content-Type":
                                                                                    "application/json",
                                                                            },
                                                                        },
                                                                    })
                                                                );
                                                            }
                                                        });
                                                    }}
                                                >
                                                    {roles.includes(UserRole.DSHE_DG)
                                                        ? "Approved"
                                                        : "Forward"}
                                                </Button>
                                            </Col>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </>
                            ) : (
                                ""
                            )}
                            {roles.includes(UserRole.PROGRAMMER_ZONAL_OFFICE) ? (
                                <>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="জেলা"
                                            name="districtCode"
                                            operationId={
                                                UrlBuilder.mpoDsheApi(
                                                    `zonal-office/district-all?zonalId=${AuthUser.getZoneId()}`
                                                )

                                            }
                                            storeName="district1"
                                            value="districtCode"
                                            text="districtNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="উপজেলা/থানা"
                                            name="thanaCode"
                                            operationId={
                                                values.districtCode
                                                    ? UrlBuilder.commonApi(
                                                        `thana/all?districtCode=${values.districtCode}`
                                                    )
                                                    : ""
                                            }
                                            storeName="thana1"
                                            value="thanaCode"
                                            text="thanaNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="প্রতিষ্ঠানের ধরন"
                                            name="instituteTypeId"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: 11,
                                                    name: "স্কুল",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: 2,
                                                    name: "কলেজ",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: 12,
                                                    name: "স্কুল এন্ড কলেজ",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="instituteTypeId" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="আবেদনকারীর ধরন"
                                            name="employeeTypeStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "শিক্ষক",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.NON_TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "কর্মচারী",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="employeeTypeStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                            name="indexNo"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="indexNo" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputDatePicker
                                            label="রিলিজ আবেদনের তারিখ"
                                            name="fromReviewDate"
                                            setField={setFieldValue}
                                            dataValue={values.fromReviewDate}
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputDatePicker
                                            label="সর্বশেষ রিলিজ আবেদনের তারিখ"
                                            name="toReviewDate"
                                            setField={setFieldValue}
                                            dataValue={values.toReviewDate}
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="রিভিউআর"
                                            name="reviewedRole"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: "USEO",
                                                    name: "USEO",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "DEO",
                                                    name: "DEO",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "DD_ZONAL_SCHOOL",
                                                    name: "DD ZONAL SCHOOL",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "DD_ZONAL_COLLEGE",
                                                    name: "DD ZONAL COLLEGE",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "AD_ZONAL_COLLEGE",
                                                    name: "AD ZONAL COLLEGE",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "ZONAL_DIRECTOR",
                                                    name: "ZONAL DIRECTOR",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "PROGRAMMER_ZONAL_OFFICE",
                                                    name: "PROGRAMMER ZONAL OFFICE",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "DD_ZONAL_COLLEGE",
                                                    name: "DD ZONAL COLLEGE",
                                                }

                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="রিভিউআর  স্ট্যাটাস "
                                            name="reviewStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: "REVIEW_FORWARD",
                                                    name: "REVIEW FORWARD",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "REVIEW_BACKWARD",
                                                    name: "REVIEW BACKWARD",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "CANCELLED",
                                                    name: "CANCELED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "APPROVED",
                                                    name: "APPROVED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: "BACK_TO_APPLICANT",
                                                    name: "BACK TO APPLICANT",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="অনুমোদনের স্ট্যাটাস"
                                            name="applicationStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.APPROVED,
                                                    name: "APPROVED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.CANCELED,
                                                    name: "CANCELED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.UNDER_REVIEW,
                                                    name: "UNDER REVIEW",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.REVIEW_PENDING,
                                                    name: "REVIEW PENDING",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="applicationStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                </>
                            ) : (
                                ""
                            )}

                            {(roles.includes(UserRole.DDZONAL_COLLEGE) || roles.includes(UserRole.DDZONAL_SCHOOL) || roles.includes(UserRole.ZONAL_DIRECTOR) || roles.includes(UserRole.AD_ZONAL_COLLEGE)) ? (
                                <>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="জেলা"
                                            name="districtCode"
                                            operationId={
                                                UrlBuilder.mpoDsheApi(
                                                    `zonal-office/district-all?zonalId=${AuthUser.getZoneId()}`
                                                )

                                            }
                                            storeName="district1"
                                            value="districtCode"
                                            text="districtNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelectApi
                                            label="উপজেলা/থানা"
                                            name="thanaCode"
                                            operationId={
                                                values.districtCode
                                                    ? UrlBuilder.commonApi(
                                                        `thana/all?districtCode=${values.districtCode}`
                                                    )
                                                    : ""
                                            }
                                            storeName="thana1"
                                            value="thanaCode"
                                            text="thanaNameBn"
                                            type="text"
                                        />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="প্রতিষ্ঠানের ধরন"
                                            name="instituteTypeId"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={roles.includes(UserRole.DDZONAL_COLLEGE) ? [
                                                {
                                                    id: 2,
                                                    name: "কলেজ",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: 12,
                                                    name: "স্কুল এন্ড কলেজ",
                                                },
                                            ] : [
                                                {
                                                    id: 11,
                                                    name: "স্কুল",
                                                }

                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="instituteTypeId" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="আবেদনকারীর ধরন"
                                            name="employeeTypeStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "শিক্ষক",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: EmployeeTypeStatus.NON_TEACHING_EMPLOYEE,
                                                    name: "কর্মচারী",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="employeeTypeStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputField
                                            label="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                            name="indexNo"
                                            type="text"
                                            placeholder="শিক্ষক/কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী আইডি"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="indexNo" />
                                    </Col>
                                    <Col xl={3} lg={4} md={6} className="mb-10">
                                        <InputSelect
                                            label="অনুমোদনের স্ট্যাটাস"
                                            name="applicationStatus"
                                            type="text"
                                            value="id"
                                            data={[
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.APPROVED,
                                                    name: "APPROVED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.CANCELED,
                                                    name: "CANCELED",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.UNDER_REVIEW,
                                                    name: "UNDER REVIEW",
                                                },
                                                {
                                                    id: ApplicationStatus.REVIEW_PENDING,
                                                    name: "REVIEW PENDING",
                                                },
                                            ]}
                                            text="name"
                                        />
                                        <ErrorMessage fieldName="applicationStatus" />
                                    </Col>
                                </>
                            ) : (
                                ""
                            )}



                            <Col md={12} className="mb-10 mt-10">
                                <Button
                                    variant="success"
                                    className="f-right m-10 btn btn-white btn-primary"
                                    type="submit"
                                >
                                    <FontAwesomeIcon
                                        icon={faSearch}
                                        className="me-2"
                                    />{" "}
                                    অনুসন্ধান করুন
                                </Button>
                            </Col>
                        </Row>
                    </Form>
                );
            }}
        </Formik>
    );
};

export default ListFilter;
